Reviews.Title: Great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ray Alstrom
Reviews.Content: We are a midsize company with a small sales force.  I've been looking at different makes and models of laptops to replace our aging and retired OS Windows XP computers.  These Lenovo ThinkPads fit the bill.  Lightweight, but sturdy, speedy AMD processor and Windows 7 Professional, which our salespeople prefer over Windows 8.

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; AMD Elite A6-5350M 2.9GHz up to 3.5GHz Turbo Core Accelerated Processor
15.6" diagonal LED-backlit HD anti-glare display (1366 x 768); 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz PC3-12800 RAM (2 Dimm)
320GB 5400RPM SATA III Hard Drive; AMD Radeon HD 8450G Graphics; DVD+/-RW
802.11b/g/n; Gigabit Ethernet; Webcam; 3 x USB 3.0; USB 2.0; 6-Cell 48 Wh Li-Ion Battery (Up to 6.2 hours)
Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Numeric Keypad; Dolby Audio V2; HDMI; VGA; 1 Year Lenovo Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo ThinkPad Edge E545 20B20011US AMD Elite 15.6" Windows 7 Professional Business Notebook PC (AMD A6-5350M 2.9GHz Processor, Windows 7 PRO 64-Bit, 8GB RAM, 320GB Hard Drive)
